item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi I am paradox3852 and this is my first post! I share content that is related to Neuroscience, Mathematics and Deep Learning. The purpose of this blog is to share and translate knowledge into something in which everyone would understand. I hope you love learning as much as I do. All the best and have a great day!
